ingredients: 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, 1  egg, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/4 teaspoon baking powder, 1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries,   +   1/2 cup sweetened condensed milk, 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 12%, Saturated Fat 6g 28%, Cholesterol 17mg 6%, Sodium 100mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 0mg 1%, Calcium 39mg 3%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 159mg 3%
